name: !Sphere Splash - Premium
description:
Please Note: This game is paid, ads free, no IAP, small app size, more functionality and better user experience..

The objective of this game is simple : Game board is filled with differently colored 'balls'. The basic move of this game is horizontally or vertically swapping the positions of two adjacent balls, to create sets of three (or more) balls of the same color. It must be completed in a given time.

Features include :-

* Awesome gameplay
* Clean UI
* Nice music and sound effects
* Cool animations
* No IAP, no ADS and much more....

Use your strategic skills to match 3 or more colored balls and have fun....
